item.title: Fail fast, fight smarter: Silicon Valley’s startup mentality is rewiring the Pentagon
item.description: The Pentagon is slowly moving from manually inputting intelligence to AI-fueled solutions.

item.title: Morgan Stanley posts biggest earnings beat in nearly 5 years with record quarterly revenue of $18.2 billion, shares up 4.7%
item.description: In a strong week for Wall Street banks, CEO Ted Pick said "the capital markets flywheel is taking hold."

item.title: Mark Cuban warns that OpenAI’s new plan to allow adults-only erotica in ChatGPT could ‘backfire. Hard’
item.description: “No parent is going to trust that their kids can’t get through your age gating,” Cuban wrote on X.

item.title: The CEO behind Abercrombie & Fitch’s turnaround says the retailer isn’t chasing ‘cool’—it wants to be a ‘lifestyle’ brand instead
item.description: The CEO has lined up the NFL and Macy’s as partners to keep its momentum going.

item.title: Why Michelle Obama’s stylist invested in the LVMH-backed AI styling platform Alta: ‘It was a no-brainer’
item.description: Celebrity stylist Meredith Koop says the “brilliant” mind behind LVMH-backed AI stylist Alta, Jenny Wang, sold her on investing in the technology.
